svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Stunting vs level of prosperity, 2000 to 2017
Stunting measures the share of children younger than 5 years that fall below two standard deviations from the median
height-for-age of the WHO Child Growth Standards. GDP per capita is adjusted for price changes over time and
between countries (presented in international-$ in 2011 prices).
Average annual change in GDP per capita (2011 international-$)
Average annual change in stunting prevalence
